name: operation, housing system, cattle, loose | operation, housing system, cattle, loose, per animal unit | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11615/documentation

The module includes the use of energy and auxiliary materials for the operation of lighting, storage and drying of roughage, dung scraper, slurry agitator, milking machine, milk cooling, cleaning, drinking water. The functional unit is 1 livestock unit (LU) during 1 year. The original inventory on which the GLO is based applies to Swiss agricultural buildings. Child dataset exchanges adapted to Quebec context for a number of exchanges. Some exchanges are still based on GLO dataset - uncertainty adjusted accordingly.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The inventory takes into account the energy and auxiliary materials like water, lubricating oil and cleaning agents for the use of the described module for one year. Also included is the use of the infrastructure with the binding of a certain part of the appropriate infrastructure module. Not taken into account were the direct emission of the animal husbandry, fodder production and produced waste water.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/014:Animal production/0141:Raising of cattle and buffaloes

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The original inventory on which the GLO is based applies to Swiss agricultural buildings. Child dataset exchanges adapted to Quebec context for a number of exchanges. Some exchanges are still based on GLO dataset - uncertainty adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The use of energy and auxiliary materials are calculated for the conditions defined in the infrastructure-module with literature data and experts knowledge.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The original inventory on which the GLO is based applies to Swiss agricultural buildings. Child dataset exchanges adapted to Quebec context for a number of exchanges. Some exchanges are still based on GLO dataset - uncertainty adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: In the use of energy and auxiliary materials are big differences between the farms.The inventory is based on mean values from CH and WEU.
